download_resource(destination, path=None)Â¶

Download a service template resource from the storage resource API (âRAPIâ).

download_resource_and_render(destination, path=None, variables=None)Â¶

Downloads a service template resource from the resource storage and renders its content as a Jinja template using the provided variables. ctx is available to the template without providing it explicitly.

get_resource(path=None)Â¶

Reads a service instance resource as string from the resource storage.

get_resource_and_render(path=None, variables=None)Â¶

Reads a service instance resource as string from the resource storage and renders it as a Jinja template using the provided variables. ctx is available to the template without providing it explicitly.
